DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Forecast vs Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":17,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"ForecastTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select
	v.Project,
	v.MonthYear,
	sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
	sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over (order by v.YearMonth) as ActualTimeRunningTotal,
	sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over () as ActualTimeGrandTotal,
	sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
	sum(sum(v.ForecastTime)) over (order by v.YearMonth) as ForecastTimeRunningTotal,
	sum(sum(v.ForecastTime)) over () as ForecastTimeGrandTotal
from (
	select 
		v.Project,
		concat(format(v.[Month], '0#'), '/', v.[Year]) as MonthYear,
		concat(v.[Year], v.[Month]) as YearMonth,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		0 as ForecastTime
	from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
	where 
		v.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	group by
		v.Project,
		v.[Year],
		v.[Month]
	union
	select 
		ph.Project,
		concat(format(ph.[Month], '0#'), '/', ph.[Year]) as MonthYear,
		concat(ph.[Year], ph.[Month]) as YearMonth,
		0 as ActualTime,
		sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime
	from
		Analytics.PlannedHours(@CurrentUserId) ph
	where 
		ph.ProjectId = @ProjectId and
		ph.[Year] >= Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and
		ph.[Month] >= Month(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
	group by
		ph.Project,
		ph.[Year],
		ph.[Month]
) v
group by
	v.Project,
	v.MonthYear,
	v.YearMonth"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Department Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time (blue) vs Contracted (red)","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":34,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Actual","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select
	v.DepartmentId,
	IsNull(d.[Name], 'Without department') as DepartmentName,
	sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
	sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over () as ActualTimeGrandTotal,
	sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
	sum(sum(v.ContractedTime)) over () as ContractedTimeGrandTotal
from (
	select 
		v.DepartmentId,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		0 as ContractedTime
	from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
	where 
		v.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	group by
		v.DepartmentId
	union
	select 
		pht.Department as DepartmentId,
		0 as ActualTime,
		sum(pht.ContractedMinutes) / 60.0  as ContractedTime
	from
		PlannedHoursTotal pht
	where 
		pht.Project = @ProjectId and
        pht.GCRecord is null
	group by
		pht.Department
) v left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
group by
	v.DepartmentId,
	d.[Name]"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Division Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time (blue) vs Contracted (red)","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":34,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Actual","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select
	v.DivisionId,
	IsNull(d.[Name], 'Without division') as DivisionName,
	sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
	sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over () as ActualTimeGrandTotal,
	sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
	sum(sum(v.ContractedTime)) over () as ContractedTimeGrandTotal
from (
	select 
		v.DivisionId,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		0 as ContractedTime
	from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
	where 
		v.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	group by
		v.DivisionId
	union
	select 
		d.Division as DivisionId,
		0 as ActualTime,
		sum(pht.ContractedMinutes) / 60.0  as ContractedTime
	from
		PlannedHoursTotal pht
			left outer join Department d on d.Oid = pht.Department
	where 
		pht.Project = @ProjectId and
        pht.GCRecord is null
	group by
		d.Division
) v left outer join Division d on d.Oid = v.DivisionId
group by
	v.DivisionId,
	d.[Name]"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Revenue Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Planned Revenue vs Actual Cost","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":17,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Revenue","metricFieldValue":"PlannedSellGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Cost","metricFieldValue":"ActualCostGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with GetRate as (
	select 
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.[User],
		Max(pht.SellRate) as Rate
	from
		PlannedHoursTotal pht
	where
		pht.Project is not null and pht.GCRecord is null
	group by
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.[User]
)
select
	v.Project,
	v.MonthYear,
	sum(v.ActualCost) as ActualCost,
	sum(sum(v.ActualCost)) over (order by v.YearMonth) as ActualCostRunningTotal,
	sum(sum(v.ActualCost)) over () as ActualCostGrandTotal,
	sum(v.PlannedCost) as PlannedSell,
	sum(sum(v.PlannedCost)) over (order by v.YearMonth) as PlannedSellRunningTotal,
	sum(sum(v.PlannedCost)) over () as PlannedSellGrandTotal
from (
	select 
		v.Project,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		v.UserId,
		concat(format(v.[Month], '0#'), '/', v.[Year]) as MonthYear,
		concat(v.[Year], v.[Month]) as YearMonth,
		sum(v.ActualTime) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as ActualCost,
		0 as PlannedCost
	from 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
			left outer join GetRate gru on (gru.Project = v.ProjectId and gru.[User] = v.[UserId])
			left outer join GetRate grut on (grut.Project = v.ProjectId and grut.[UserTypologyGroup] = v.UserTypologyGroupId)
	where 
		v.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	group by
		v.Project,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		v.UserId,
		v.[Year],
		v.[Month],
		gru.Rate,
		grut.Rate
	union
	select 
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId,
		concat(format(Month(pht.ModifiedOn), '0#'), '/', Year(pht.ModifiedOn)) as MonthYear,
		concat(Year(pht.ModifiedOn), Month(pht.ModifiedOn)) as YearMonth,
		0 as ActualTime,
		sum(pht.[Hours]) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as PlannedCost
	from
		Analytics.PlannedHoursTotal(@CurrentUserId) pht
			left outer join GetRate gru on (gru.Project = pht.ProjectId and gru.[User] = pht.[UserId])
			left outer join GetRate grut on (grut.Project = pht.ProjectId and grut.[UserTypologyGroup] = pht.UserTypologyGroupId)
	where 
		pht.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	group by
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId,
		pht.ModifiedOn,
		gru.Rate,
		grut.Rate
) v
group by
	v.Project,
	v.MonthYear,
	v.YearMonth"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Projects
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"ProjectId","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with GetRate as (
	select 
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.[User],
		Max(pht.SellRate) as Rate
	from
		PlannedHoursTotal pht
    where   
        pht.GCRecord is null
	group by
		pht.Project,
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.[User]
)
select 
	v.ProjectId,
	v.ProjectName,
	v.ProjectType,
	v.ContractedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ContractedHoursIncome, null) as ContractedHoursIncome,
	v.PlannedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.PlannedHoursIncome, null) as PlannedHoursIncome,
	v.ForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastHoursIncome, null) as ForecastHoursIncome,
	v.ActualHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualHoursIncome, null) as ActualHoursIncome,
	v.BillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.BillableHoursIncome, null) as BillableHoursIncome,
	v.NonBillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.NonBillableHoursIncome, null) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
	v.ActualBurnPercentageHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualBurnPercentageIncome, null) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome
from (
	select
			v.ProjectId as ProjectId,
			p.[Name] as ProjectName,
			pn.[Name] as ProjectType,
			sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
			sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) as ContractedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
			sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome) as PlannedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
			sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ForecastHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) as ActualHoursIncome,
			sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
			sum(v.NonBillableHoursIncome) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours) as ActualPlusForecastHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.ActualHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageHours,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours)) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome)) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome
		from (
			select
				v.ProjectId,
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[UserId],
				sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
				sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) as ContractedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
				sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome) as PlannedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
				sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ForecastHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
				sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) as ActualHoursIncome,
				sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
				sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
				sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
				sum(v.NonBillableHoursIncome) as NonBillableHoursIncome
			from (
					select 
						pht.Project as ProjectId,
						pht.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupId,
						pht.[User] as UserId,
						sum(isnull(pht.ContractedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ContractedHours,
						(sum(isnull(pht.ContractedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as ContractedHoursIncome,
						sum(isnull(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as PlannedHours,
						(sum(isnull(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as PlannedHoursIncome,
						0 as ForecastHours,
						0 as ForecastHoursIncome,
						0 as ActualHours,
						0 as ActualHoursIncome,
						0 as BillableHours,
						0 as BillableHoursIncome,
						0 as NonBillableHours,
						0 as NonBillableHoursIncome
					from 
						PlannedHoursTotal pht
							left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pht.Project
							left outer join GetRate gru on (gru.Project = pht.Project and gru.[User] = pht.[User])
							left outer join GetRate grut on (grut.Project = pht.Project and grut.[UserTypologyGroup] = pht.UserTypologyGroup)
					where
						pht.GCRecord is null and
						p.Client = @ClientId
					group by
						pht.Project,
						pht.UserTypologyGroup,
						pht.[User],
						gru.Rate,
						grut.Rate
					union all
					select
						pha.ProjectId,
						pha.UserTypologyGroupId,
						pha.[UserId],
						0 as ContractedHours,
						0 as ContractedHoursIncome,
						0 as PlannedHours,
						0 as PlannedHoursIncome,
						sum(isnull(pha.[Hours], 0)) as ForecastHours,
						sum(isnull(pha.[Hours], 0)) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as ForecastHoursIncome,
						0 as ActualHours,
						0 as ActualHoursIncome,
						0 as BillableHours,
						0 as BillableHoursIncome,
						0 as NonBillableHours,
						0 as NonBillableHoursIncome
					from
						Analytics.DatamartPlannedHours pha
							left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pha.ProjectId
							left outer join GetRate gru on (gru.Project = pha.ProjectId and gru.[User] = pha.[UserId])
							left outer join GetRate grut on (grut.Project = pha.ProjectId and grut.[UserTypologyGroup] = pha.UserTypologyGroupId)
					where
						pha.[Year] >= Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and
						pha.[Month] >= Month(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and
						p.Client = @ClientId
					group by
						pha.ProjectId,
						pha.UserTypologyGroupId,
						pha.[UserId],
						gru.Rate,
						grut.Rate
					union all
					select
						v.ProjectId,
						v.UserTypologyGroupId,
						v.[UserId],
						0 as ContractedHours,
						0 as ContractedHoursIncome,
						0 as PlannedHours,
						0 as PlannedHoursIncome,
						0 as ForecastHours,
						0 as ForecastHoursIncome,
						sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualHours,
						sum(v.ActualTime) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as ActualHoursIncome,
						sum(v.BillableTime) as BillableHours,
						sum(v.BillableTime) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as BillableHoursIncome,
						sum(v.NewBusinessTime) as NonBillableHours,
						sum(v.NewBusinessTime) * IsNull(gru.Rate, IsNull(grut.Rate, 0)) as NonBillableHoursIncome
					from 
						Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
							left outer join GetRate gru on (gru.Project = v.ProjectId and gru.[User] = v.[UserId])
							left outer join GetRate grut on (grut.Project = v.ProjectId and grut.[UserTypologyGroup] = v.UserTypologyGroupId)
					where 
						v.ClientId = @ClientId
					group by
						v.ProjectId,
						v.UserTypologyGroupId,
						v.[UserId],
						gru.Rate,
						grut.Rate
			) v
			group by
				v.ProjectId,
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[UserId]
		) v
			left outer join Project p on p.Oid = v.ProjectId
			left outer join ProjectNature pn on pn.Oid = p.ProjectNature
		where 
			p.Client = @ClientId
		group by 
			v.ProjectId,
			p.[Name],
			pn.[Name]
) v
left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'DeliverablesSellRead')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["clientId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Group Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Contracted vs Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":47,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select
	v.UserTypologyGroupId,
	v.UserTypologyGroupName,
	v.MonthYear,
	v.ActualTime,
	v.ActualTimeGrandTotal,
	v.ContractedTime,
	v.ContractedTimeGrandTotal
from (
	select
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		concat(format(v.[Month], '0#'), '/', v.[Year]) as MonthYear,
		IsNull(utg.[Name], 'Without typology') as UserTypologyGroupName,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(sum(v.ActualTime)) over () as ActualTimeGrandTotal,
		sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(sum(v.ContractedTime)) over () as ContractedTimeGrandTotal
	from (
		select 
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.[Month] as [Month],
			v.[Year] as [Year],
			sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
			0 as ContractedTime
		from 
			Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
		where 
			v.ProjectId = @ProjectId
		group by
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.[Month],
			v.[Year]
		union
		select 
			pht.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupId,
			0 as [Month],
			0 as [Year],
			0 as ActualTime,
			sum(pht.GlobalContractedMinutes) / 60.0  as ContractedTime
		from
			PlannedHoursTotal pht
		where 
			pht.Project = @ProjectId and
			pht.GCRecord is null
		group by
			pht.UserTypologyGroup
	) v left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = v.UserTypologyGroupId
	group by
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		utg.[Name],
		v.[Month],
		v.[Year]
) v
where
	v.MonthYear != '00/0'"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["projectId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: User Burn
